Title: Ahista Ahista
Writer: Imtiaz Ali (story and screenplay), Arif Ali (dialogue), Rajiv b Menon (additional dialogue)
Actors: Abhay Deol, Soha Ali Khan, Shayan Munshi, Murad Ali
Plot: For a fee of Rs.200/- Ankush Ramdev acted as one among four witnesses to couples who come to register their marriages at the Registrar of Marriages in Dariyaganj, Delhi. One day he comes ...
